title: Georgia D.A. Requests Grand Jury to Probe Trump Bid to Overturn 2020 Vote
sub_head: Fulton County district attorney says she needs subpoena power to get testimony
body:
ATLANTA—The top prosecutor for Georgia’s most populous county has requested a special grand jury to investigate efforts to overturn Georgia’s 2020 election results, the first indication in months that a probe is proceeding into the actions of former President Donald Trump and supporters after his loss in the state.
In a letter sent Thursday, Fulton County District Attorney Fani Willis told the chief judge of Fulton County’s Superior Court that the grand jury was necessary to secure key testimony.
